description.narrative: To support the design of a detailed proposal narrative and budget. Key members of Bankable Frontier Associates (US) and its partner MicroSave (India) will visit up to 4 institutions in Sub-Saharan Africa and India (if no suitable institutions or products are identified in Africa), to identify two of the best partners to participate in experimental research on alternative ways to deliver and achieve financial capability. The planning grant will support Bankable Frontier Associates (BFA) and MicroSave to draw conclusions on their field visits and develop a proposal to implement this innovative pilot with the right organizations.
